extensionDescription.message: An add-on allowing mass item selling on Steam

controls_button_sell.description: Button title for controls panel that brings up the confirmation modal

modal_button_clear.description: Title for button used to clear selected items list and close the modal

modal_button_close.description: Title for button used close the modal

modal_button_sell.description: Title for button used to confirm selling selected items in modal

modal_price_modifier_median.description: Title for radiobutton to use average price taken from steam price info for selling items

modal_price_modifier_percentage.description: Title for radiobutton to use (average price + percentage from it) for selling items

modal_price_modifier_custom.description: Title for radiobutton to use custom prices set by user for selling items

modal_items_empty.description: Text displayed in modal when no items were selected to be sold
